name: A Ghost's Lullaby
description:
Sean has a crush on a girl in his class. She is so shy and never talks to anyone but him.

Tomorrow will be Valentines day, the weather report says it will stop raining, the sun will shine and it's also a Sunday. A perfect day.

If only Sean hadn't forgotten his present at school. Desperate to save the next day he sneaks into the school building to get it, but soon he feels a strange presence and remembers the school mysteries about some ghosts that are trapped inside the building.

!!! This game was created for a contest within a month. !!!

Features

- The game is focused on atmosphere and fear of the unknown
- No? jumpscares
- (more or less) dynamic light - Torchlight gameplay
- Dynamic flashes! (\°O°/) (Okay, this isn't a feature, but I'm proud :P )
- Some riddles
- Multiple endings
